paper_abstract: This paper focuses on approximating the metric 1-median problem with sublinear number of queries and time complexity. We first show a simper proof of the currently best 4-approximation algorithm, and then propose a recursive algorithm. For any integer h >= 2, the algorithm finds a 2h-approximation solution with O(n(1+1/h)) queries and time complexity. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On approximating metric 1-median in sublinear time
